summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Alki Avenue, from 53rd Avenue Southwest, to 58th Avenue Southwest, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8368 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
